text: The Indiana Pacers are an American professional basketball team in the National Basketball Association (NBA) in Indianapolis, Indiana. They began playing in the American Basketball Association (ABA) from 1967 to 1976. The Pacers joined the NBA in 1976. They play their home games at Gainbridge Fieldhouse. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:National Basketball Association teams Category:Indianapolis Category:1967 establishments in the United States
title: Indiana Pacers
